hadiths.text: Maimunah bin Sa’d who was a servant for the Prophet, narrated that The Messenger of Allah said:“The parable of the woman who walks to impress others in adornments for other than her family, is that of darkness on the Day of Judgment: There is no light for her.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فى كَرَاهِيَةِ خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ فِي الزِّينَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about it being disliked for women to go out while wearing their adornments
